content: आरभ्य {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} Having begun, beginning with, ever since, since, with a prepositional force (with <ab>abl.</ab>); मालत्याः प्रथमावलोकदिवसादारभ्य <ls>Māl. 6. 3</ls>; <ls>Ś. 3</ls>; <ls>K. 102</ls>, <ls n="K.">134</ls>, <ls n="K.">196</ls>; sometimes with <ab>acc.</ab> also; प्रतिपद्दिनमारभ्य <ls>Bhāg.</ls>
